room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Gettysburg in Gettysburg
review: We had an awesome time trying to escape the Mad Hatter room. This really is fun for all ages since even my 8-year-old niece was having a blast helping us with the clues! I highly recommend Escape Gettysburg and will go again the next time I'm in the area.

room_title: Escape room "Mad Hatter" by Escape Gettysburg in Gettysburg
review: I had a great time with my family escaping the Mad Hatter's Tea Party room. It was more difficult than I expected and that made it so much more fun than I anticipated too! The staff was wonderful and did a great job of taking care of our group from start to finish. Can't wait to try another room!
